transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER THE HON P.J. KEATING NATIONAL CRIME AUTHORITY BOMBING REWARD
transcript.content:
TEL
I PRIME MINISTER
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P. J. KEATING, MP
NATIONAL CRIME AUTHORITY BOMBING REWARD
The Federal Government will contribute $ 250,000 towards a reward being
offered to help bring to justice the culprit or culprits responsible for the tragic
bombing of the NCA office In Adelaide yesterday.
This contribution will be combined with the $ 250,000 reward offered by the
South Australian Government to assist the police investigation.
I appeal to anyone with information which may assist police in their inquiries
to come forward immediately.
The Government will make every effort to ensure whoever perpetrated the
savage and senseless attack is apprehended.
CANBERRA 3 March 1994 16/ 94
T3EL.: Mar. 94 13: 08 No. 010 P. 01/ 01!
